name: SPROUT (itch) (Reccy, ryemcagames)
description:
Henlo, welcome to Sprout!

Ever wondered what it’s like to be able to throw your head at people? Well now you can experience that from the comfort of your own home!

In Sprout you play as a lil' plant with a semi detachable head joined to his body by a vine. Explore the ancient ruins, collecting silly lil' seedlings along the way and join them together in their pods at the end to create a thriving plant community! 
Literally use your head to navigate the dangerous environment you find yourself in and discover all the joys it has to offer!
But more importantly, discover yourself, you wonderful person you.

We hope you enjoy our dumb little game, we had a lot of fun putting it together for people to play.

Game Credits:

Ryan McEvoy - Twitter (@RyemcaGames)
